channel.title: canvas on Learn Javascript
channel.description: Recent content in canvas on Learn Javascript

item.title: Canvas Draw
item.description: 展開 原始碼([Demo] Canvas Draw Image.html) <!DOCTYPE html> <html> <head> <style> </style> <script> </script> </head> <body> <input type="file" id="browse" > <img id="img"> <script> var reader = new FileReader(); reader.onload = function(e) { // e: progressEvent // e.target: FileReader Object // e.target.result就是圖片的base64位址資訊(result of readAsDataURL) img.src = e.target.result; }; browse.addEventListener('change', function (event) { reader.readAsDataURL(event.target.files[0]); }); </script> </body> </html> 編輯 <!DOCTYPE html> <html> <head> <style> </style> <script> </script> </head> <body> <input type="file" id="browse" > <img id="img"> <script> var reader = new FileReader(); reader.
